评论详情: I wanted to have this T-shirt for so long and could not wait to receive it. When I was searching for the T-shirt, most of them were unisex and that is not what I was looking for as I do not have a straight up and down body, I am very curvy, especially on the bottom.  This particular T-shirt said it was a women’s T-shirt and so I ordered it. The size I would order in a regular women’s T-shirt. When I received it, it was a unisex T-shirt and I cannot wear it because it does not fit over the bottom of my body.  I do love it very much because I have been to Paris, but I will need to lose some weight before I’ll be able to wear it on my body.  The material is not as soft as I had anticipated. It is very crisp before washing and I have not washed it yet so I cannot comment on how it will be after washing, but the black is a beautiful deep color and the white on the front seems to be substantially put on.

This trendy women's T-shirt effortlessly complements casual pants, jeans, joggers, shorts, and sneakers, making it a stylish choice for spring, autumn, and winter. You can also layer it under a jacket for added flair.
Pretty long sleeve t shirt, fabric very confy.
It was poorly packaged. Came wadded up. Looked like it had been worn. Smelled weird and had stains on it. Also way more yellow than ivory.
I was expecting a sweatshirt but I received a t-shirt! Totally not the quality I expected. I’m not sure if it’s just the cream color that’s a t-shirt but I would not waste my money.

I got the tshirt version. Nice, thick cotton material. length is right just covering the hip. Some review mentioned it  runs super large, but medium fit me great even though I usually wear size small. I am 5.8, 142lbs. I ordered the sweat version and love it too.
